meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inseparable.
meanings.sent1: The inseparableness of the twins was evident in how they always did everything together.
meanings.sent2: The inseparableness of the best friends was heartwarming to witness.
meanings.sent3: The inseparableness of the socks in the laundry was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The inseparableness of the sun and the sky created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The inseparableness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be separated or divided.
meanings.sent1: The inseparableness of the glue on the paper made it difficult to remove.
meanings.sent2: The inseparableness of the team ensured their success in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The inseparableness of the peanut butter and jelly in the sandwich was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The inseparableness of the roots of the tree and the ground symbolized stability.
meanings.sent5: The inseparableness of the magnet and the metal was fascinating to observe.
